workflow.name: Creating consistent character videos with Veo 3.1, GPT-4o, and Google NanoBanana
workflow.description:
**This n8n template demonstrates how to create consistent character videos using AI image and video generation. The workflow generates photorealistic videos featuring the same character across different poses, locations, and outfits, maintaining perfect character consistency throughout cinematic transitions.**

**Use cases are many:** Create consistent character content for social media, generate cinematic videos for brand campaigns, produce lifestyle content with the same character, automate video content creation for TikTok/Instagram, create character-based storytelling videos, or scale video production with consistent visual identity!

### **Good to know**

- The workflow maintains perfect character consistency across frames using reference images
- Uses multiple AI services: GPT-4o for prompt generation, Google Nano Banana Edit for image generation, and Veo 3.1 for video creation
- Features 100 unique locations (beaches, cities, cafes, rooftops, etc.) and 15 different poses
- KIE.AI pricing: Check current rates for Veo 3.1 and Nano Banana Edit models
- Processing time: ~5-10 minutes per complete video (depends on AI service queue)
- Output format: 9:16 aspect ratio videos optimized for TikTok/Instagram
- Automatically generates social media content (titles, descriptions, hashtags) using GPT-4o
- Includes AI disclosure labels for TikTok compliance

### **How it works**

1. **Location & Pose Selection:** Randomly selects one location from 100 options and 3 unique poses from 15 options
2. **AI Story Creation:** GPT-4o generates cinematic prompts for first frame, last frame, and video motion while maintaining character identity from reference images
3. **Start Frame Generation:** Google Nano Banana Edit creates the first frame image with character in initial pose, location, and outfit
4. **End Frame Generation:** Nano Banana Edit generates the final frame using start frame as reference, changing only pose/expression while maintaining consistency
5. **Video Generation:** Veo 3.1 creates smooth cinematic video transition between frames with natural character movement
6. **Content Creation:** GPT-4o generates engaging title, description, and hashtags for social media
7. **Auto-Publishing:** Automatically posts to TikTok (with AI disclosure) and Instagram, plus sends previews via Telegram

The workflow ensures the same character appears in both frames with identical facial features, hair, skin tone, and overall appearance, while only pose and expression change. The video features dynamic camera movements (arc shots, dolly pushes, crane rises, etc.) for cinematic quality.

### **How to use**

1. **Setup Credentials:** Configure OpenAI API, KIE.AI API, Blotato API, and Telegram Bot credentials
2. **Add Reference Images:** Update the 5 reference image URLs in the "Create Start Frame" node with your character images
3. **Configure Social Media:** Set up Blotato accounts for TikTok and Instagram posting
4. **Set Telegram Chat ID:** Replace `YOUR_TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID` with your Telegram chat ID for previews
5. **Deploy Workflow:** Import the template and activate the workflow
6. **Trigger Generation:** Use the schedule trigger (default: every 6 hours) or replace with manual/webhook trigger
7. **Receive Content:** Get previews via Telegram and published posts on TikTok & Instagram

**Pro tip:** The workflow uses 5 reference images to maintain character consistency. For best results, use clear, high-quality photos of your character from different angles. The workflow automatically handles character identity preservation across all generated content.

### **Requirements**

- **OpenAI API** account for GPT-4o prompt generation and social media content creation
- **KIE.AI API** account for Veo 3.1 video generation and Google Nano Banana Edit image generation
- **Blotato API** account for TikTok and Instagram posting automation
- **Telegram Bot** setup for preview delivery (optional but recommended)
- **n8n** instance (cloud or self-hosted)
- **Reference Images:** 5 high-quality images of your character (URLs or hosted images)

### **Customizing this workflow**

**Character Variations:** Modify the reference images to create videos with different characters while maintaining the same workflow structure.

**Location Customization:** Edit the location pool in the "Code in JavaScript" node to add or modify locations (currently 100 options).

**Pose Library:** Expand or customize the pose library in the JavaScript code node (currently 15 poses with detailed guidance).

**Social Media Platforms:** Add more platforms by duplicating the Blotato nodes and configuring additional accounts (YouTube, Facebook, etc.).

**Content Style:** Adjust GPT-4o prompts in "Story Creator Agent" and "Title Description" nodes to change content tone, style, or language.

**Scheduling:** Replace the schedule trigger with webhook, form, or manual trigger based on your needs.

**Video Settings:** Modify Veo 3.1 parameters (aspect ratio, watermark, seeds) in the "Veo 3.1" node for different output formats.

**Batch Processing:** Add loops to generate multiple videos with different location/pose combinations automatically.

messageValues.message:
=You are an AI system that generates photorealistic, cinematic portrait prompts.

Your task is to generate **TWO cinematic image prompts** representing the **first frame and the last frame**, plus a **dedicated cinematic video motion prompt** for a video featuring the **same girl from the provided reference image**.
You must use the **location, mood, outfit, and poses** supplied by the incoming JSON data.

--------------------------------------------
### REFERENCE IMAGE RULES
You MUST base the girl‚Äôs identity on the provided image:
- identical face structure
- identical eye color and shape
- identical skin tone
- identical hairstyle and texture
- identical overall appearance

Never describe her generically (‚Äúa young woman‚Äù).  
Always force the identity to match the **same girl from the reference image**.

--------------------------------------------
### LOCATION / OUTFIT / MOOD  
Use exactly the values provided:

- **Location (ID {{ $json.location.id }}):** {{ $json.location.name }}
- **Outfit mapping:** {{ $json.location.outfit }}
- **Mood:** {{ $json.location.mood }}

--------------------------------------------
### POSES  
Use ONLY these two poses:

1. **First Frame Pose:** {{ $json.poses[0].label }} ‚Äî {{ $json.poses[0].guidance }}
2. **Last Frame Pose:** {{ $json.poses[1].label }} ‚Äî {{ $json.poses[1].guidance }}

Do NOT randomize or replace any pose.

--------------------------------------------
### VERY IMPORTANT RULES

‚úî The **same girl** must appear in BOTH frames  
‚úî The **same location environment** must appear in BOTH frames  
‚úî The **same mood and atmosphere** must appear in BOTH frames  
‚úî The **same lighting style** must appear in BOTH frames  
‚úî The **same outfit** must appear in BOTH frames (but do NOT mention the clothing in the frames)  
‚úî ONLY her **pose, angle, or expression** may change  

Do NOT mention clothing in any frame description.  
Place the outfit ONLY in the `"dress"` field.

--------------------------------------------
### CINEMATIC STYLE REQUIREMENTS
Each frame must be:
- photorealistic  
- editorial  
- cinematic  
- identical lighting, tone, and environment  
- portrait-focused framing  

--------------------------------------------
### VIDEO PROMPT REQUIREMENTS (DYNAMIC CAMERA SYSTEM)

The video prompt MUST:

- Describe a **smooth physical transition** from the first pose to the last pose  
- Include **natural facial expression interpolation**
- Include **micro body movement, breathing, and hair motion**
- Keep **lighting, mood, environment, and outfit fully locked**
- Include a **cinematic camera movement**
- The **camera movement MUST be different every time** and may include (but is not limited to):
  - 180¬∞ arc shot
  - Slow dolly push-in
  - Subtle orbit with parallax
  - Crane rise
  - Lateral tracking shot
  - Tilt + push combination
  - Over-the-shoulder reveal
- MUST be:
  - Continuous
  - No cuts
  - No scene changes
  - No outfit changes
- MUST remain:
  - Photorealistic
  - Editorial
  - Cinematic

--------------------------------------------
### OUTPUT FORMAT (VERY IMPORTANT)
Return ONLY valid JSON in this format:

{
  "first_frame": "...",
  "last_frame": "...",
  "video_prompt": "...",
  "dress": "..."
}

--------------------------------------------
### WHAT TO GENERATE

- **First Frame** must contain full cinematic description.
- **Last Frame** must ONLY change the pose and expression.
- **Video Prompt** must:
  - Describe the physical transition
  - Describe emotional interpolation
  - Describe realistic micro-movements
  - Describe a **UNIQUE cinematic camera movement each time**
- Do NOT introduce new lighting, new mood, or new environment in the last frame or video prompt.

--------------------------------------------
### NOW GENERATE THE FINAL JSON:

{
  "first_frame": "A cinematic portrait of the same girl from the reference image, preserving her exact facial identity ‚Äî same facial structure, eye shape, hair texture, skin tone, and natural features. She appears in the '{{ $json.location.name }}' environment with the consistent '{{ $json.location.mood }}' atmosphere. She performs the pose '{{ $json.poses[0].label }}' ({{ $json.poses[0].guidance }}). Photorealistic, editorial, cinematic lighting and composition with portrait-focused framing.",
  
  "last_frame": "Same girl, same environment, same lighting. She now performs the pose '{{ $json.poses[1].label }}' ({{ $json.poses[1].guidance }}).",
  
  "video_prompt": "A continuous cinematic shot where the same girl transitions smoothly from the first pose into the final pose with realistic body mechanics, expressive facial interpolation, subtle breathing motion, and natural micro-movements in hair and posture. The camera executes a UNIQUE cinematic movement for this shot ‚Äî such as a smooth 180-degree arc, a slow dolly push-in with parallax shift, a controlled lateral track, or an elegant crane rise ‚Äî dynamically revealing new perspective while preserving consistent lighting, mood, and environment. No cuts, no scene changes, no outfit changes, maintaining uninterrupted editorial photorealism.",
  
  "dress": "Detailed outfit description ‚Äî {{ $json.location.outfit }} ‚Äî matching the mood '{{ $json.location.mood }}'."
}

parameters.content:
## Muhammad Farooq Iqbal - Automation Expert & n8n Creator

I am a passionate automation expert and recognized n8n Creator specializing in intelligent workflow automation. With extensive experience in n8n, AI automation, Zapier, and Make.com, I have created innovative workflow templates with 500+ downloads across the global automation community

### Expertise
- **Workflow Automation**: n8n, Zapier, Make.com, AI automation
- **AI Integration**: Gemini AI, API integration, data processing
- **Platform Mastery**: Google Sheets, Google Drive, custom scripts

## Need Help with This Workflow?

If you face any issues with this workflow or need customization support, feel free to reach out:

**üìß Email**: mfarooqiqbal143@gmail.com  
**üì± Phone**: +923036991118  
**üíº LinkedIn**: [Connect with me](https://linkedin.com/in/muhammadfarooqiqbal)  
**üåê Portfolio**: [View my work](https://mfarooqone.github.io/n8n/)
**UpWork**: [Upwork Profile](https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/~011aeba159896e2eba)

*I'm always excited to help with automation challenges and workflow optimization!*

messageValues.message:
=*"You are writing social media content as a lifestyle/fashion influencer. Based on the following visual description, create:

A catchy, stylish title (max 8 words, influencer tone, cinematic vibe).

A short, engaging description (1‚Äì2 sentences, written in first-person or influencer style, inviting followers into the mood/scene).

5 strong hashtags (blend of aesthetic, fashion, cinematic, and lifestyle trends).

parameters.jsCode:
// n8n Function node: Random Location (1‚Äì100) + 3 Unique Poses (1‚Äì15)
// Includes readable labels for both, and a 5% cap on cafe/library/office-like IDs

// ---- Config: restricted location IDs (caf√©s, libraries, offices & variants)
const RESTRICTED = new Set([4, 5, 23, 43, 53, 96]); // ‚â§5% chance overall

// ---- Pose pool (IDs 1..15)
const POSES = [
  { id: 1,  label: "Facing the camera", guidance: "natural, expressive look, direct connection" },
  { id: 2,  label: "Side profile", guidance: "elegant, dynamic profile with emotion" },
  { id: 3,  label: "Back pose", guidance: "storytelling, looking over shoulder or natural walk" },
  { id: 4,  label: "Sitting casually", guidance: "relaxed, candid moment with subtle expression" },
  { id: 5,  label: "Leaning against structure", guidance: "editorial calm confidence" },
  { id: 6,  label: "Walking mid-step", guidance: "motion-filled cinematic realism" },
  { id: 7,  label: "Looking down thoughtfully", guidance: "introspective softness" },
  { id: 8,  label: "Laughing or smiling naturally", guidance: "expressive authenticity" },
  { id: 9,  label: "Hair in motion", guidance: "dynamic energy, natural movement" },
  { id: 10, label: "Sitting on ground or ledge", guidance: "grounded emotional tone" },
  { id: 11, label: "Looking into distance", guidance: "cinematic depth and reflection" },
  { id: 12, label: "Turning halfway", guidance: "natural transition moment, in motion" },
  { id: 13, label: "Seated with crossed legs", guidance: "poised, composed aesthetic" },
  { id: 14, label: "Hands in pockets", guidance: "casual composure, modern attitude" },
  { id: 15, label: "Looking up at light", guidance: "ethereal, hopeful expression" },
];

// ---- Location mapping (IDs 1..100)
const LOCATIONS = [
  { id: 1,  name: "Beach", outfit: "bikini/swimsuit (pastel or bold)", mood: "carefree, relaxed by waves" },
  { id: 2,  name: "Airport", outfit: "trousers + light jacket (neutral)", mood: "thoughtful, waiting calmly" },

  { id: 5,  name: "Library", outfit: "cozy sweater + skirt", mood: "focused, gentle concentration" },
  { id: 6,  name: "Runway backstage", outfit: "sleek fashion black", mood: "stylish intensity" },
  { id: 7,  name: "Mountain trail", outfit: "sportswear/leggings", mood: "fresh, energized mid-step" },
  { id: 8,  name: "High-rise rooftop", outfit: "blazer + jeans", mood: "contemplative skyline gaze" },
  { id: 9,  name: "Subway station", outfit: "hoodie/streetwear", mood: "calm, listening to music" },
  { id: 10, name: "Rainy street", outfit: "trench coat + umbrella", mood: "soft cinematic romance" },
  { id: 11, name: "Desert dunes", outfit: "flowing maxi dress", mood: "poetic, wind-swept" },
  { id: 12, name: "Art gallery", outfit: "blouse + tailored pants", mood: "cultured admiration" },
  { id: 13, name: "Modern kitchen", outfit: "casual homewear", mood: "cozy, warm tone" },
  { id: 14, name: "Luxury hotel lobby", outfit: "formal dress", mood: "poised elegance" },

  { id: 16, name: "Countryside field", outfit: "floral sundress", mood: "carefree laughter" },
  { id: 17, name: "Fitness studio", outfit: "sporty outfit", mood: "powerful determination" },
  { id: 18, name: "Concert lights", outfit: "rocker style", mood: "edgy, bold" },
  { id: 19, name: "Snowy street", outfit: "winter coat + scarf", mood: "warmth in cold" },
  { id: 20, name: "Rooftop bar", outfit: "evening gown", mood: "cinematic glamour" },
  { id: 21, name: "Street market", outfit: "casual chic (denim + top)", mood: "curious browsing" },
  { id: 22, name: "European alley", outfit: "vintage look", mood: "dreamy nostalgia" },

  { id: 63, name: "Rustic cabin", outfit: "knit sweater + boots", mood: "cozy solitude" },

  { id: 65, name: "Old theater", outfit: "vintage gown", mood: "dramatic elegance" },
  { id: 66, name: "Street crossing at rush hour", outfit: "modern business look", mood: "focused energy" },
  { id: 67, name: "Bridge with lanterns", outfit: "boho outfit", mood: "dreamy night" },
  { id: 68, name: "Sunny vineyard", outfit: "sundress + hat", mood: "relaxed joy" },

  { id: 73, name: "Open meadow with mountains", outfit: "sundress", mood: "serene content" },
  { id: 74, name: "Urban stairwell", outfit: "edgy casual", mood: "thoughtful pause" },

  { id: 77, name: "Luxury shopping mall", outfit: "chic outfit", mood: "stylish exploration" },
  { id: 78, name: "Foggy forest trail", outfit: "layered outdoor gear", mood: "mysterious calm" },
  { id: 79, name: "Old castle ruins", outfit: "medieval-inspired dress", mood: "ethereal tone" },
  { id: 80, name: "Lakeside dock", outfit: "denim shorts + tank", mood: "peaceful gaze" },
  { id: 81, name: "Helipad rooftop", outfit: "power suit", mood: "commanding mood" },
  { id: 82, name: "Street with bicycles", outfit: "casual sporty", mood: "cheerful everyday mood" },
  { id: 83, name: "Opera house steps", outfit: "gown + clutch", mood: "elegant prestige" },
  { id: 84, name: "Industrial bridge", outfit: "leather jacket", mood: "urban cinematic mood" },
  { id: 85, name: "Flower shop", outfit: "light spring dress", mood: "sweet charm" },
  { id: 86, name: "Bus stop at night", outfit: "streetwear", mood: "reflective solitude" },
  { id: 87, name: "Tropical beach bar", outfit: "summer outfit", mood: "vibrant joy" },
  { id: 88, name: "Cultural temple courtyard", outfit: "modest chic outfit", mood: "respectful calm" },
  { id: 89, name: "Street food festival", outfit: "casual fun outfit", mood: "lively curiosity" },
  { id: 90, name: "Outdoor cinema night", outfit: "casual blanket outfit", mood: "cozy joy" },
  { id: 91, name: "Luxury rooftop infinity pool", outfit: "bikini + robe", mood: "chic elegance" },
  { id: 92, name: "Foggy seaside rocks", outfit: "wool coat", mood: "melancholic tone" },
  { id: 93, name: "Train interior", outfit: "travel attire", mood: "reflective gaze" },
  { id: 94, name: "Desert canyon", outfit: "explorer outfit", mood: "powerful presence" },
  { id: 95, name: "Luxury music lounge", outfit: "cocktail dress", mood: "sophisticated charm" },
  { id: 96, name: "Historic library hall", outfit: "classic smart outfit", mood: "intellectual poise" },
  { id: 97, name: "Bridge over waterfall", outfit: "flowing summer dress", mood: "dramatic awe" },
  { id: 98, name: "Urban skate alley", outfit: "sporty casual", mood: "energetic vibe" },
  { id: 99, name: "Sunny sunflower field", outfit: "yellow sundress", mood: "radiant joy" },
  { id: 100, name: "Candlelit rooftop dinner", outfit: "elegant evening dress", mood: "intimate romance" },
];

// ---- Helpers
function pickLocationId() {
  while (true) {
    const id = Math.floor(Math.random() * 100) + 1; // 1..100
    if (RESTRICTED.has(id)) {
      if (Math.random() < 0.05) return id; // allow ‚â§5%
      continue; // re-roll
    }
    return id;
  }
}

function pickUniquePoseIds(n = 3, maxId = 15) {
  const pool = Array.from({ length: maxId }, (_, i) => i + 1);
  for (let i = pool.length - 1; i > 0; i--) {
    const j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1));
    [pool[i], pool[j]] = [pool[j], pool[i]];
  }
  return pool.slice(0, n).sort((a, b) => a - b);
}

// ---- Draw randoms
const locationId = pickLocationId();
const poseIds = pickUniquePoseIds(3, 15);

// ---- Resolve data objects
const location = LOCATIONS.find(l => l.id === locationId);
const poses = poseIds.map(id => POSES.find(p => p.id === id));

// ---- Return for next node usage
return [{
  locationId,
  location,     // { id, name, outfit, mood }
  poseIds,      // e.g. [2, 9, 15]
  poses,        // [{id,label,guidance}, ...]
}];

={
  "prompt": "{{ $('Code1').item.json.video_prompt }}",
  "imageUrls": [
    "{{ $('Start Frame Image Url').item.json.resultUrls[0] }}",
    "{{ $('End Frame Image Url').item.json.resultUrls[0] }}"
  ],
  "model": "veo3_fast",
  "watermark": "Luma Rose",
  "callBackUrl": "http://your-callback-url.com/complete",
  "aspectRatio": "9:16",
  "seeds": 12345,
  "enableFallback": false,
  "enableTranslation": true,
  "generationType": "FIRST_AND_LAST_FRAMES_2_VIDEO"
}

parameters.content:
## üîß Setup & Integration Guide

**üìã Required API Keys & Services:**

1. **OpenAI API**
   ‚Ä¢ Get from: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
   ‚Ä¢ Used for: GPT-4o prompt generation
   ‚Ä¢ Add to: OpenAI Chat Model nodes

2. **KIE.AI API**
   ‚Ä¢ Get from: https://kie.ai/
   ‚Ä¢ Used for: Veo 3.1 video & Nano Banana Edit images
   ‚Ä¢ Replace 'YOUR_KIE_AI_API_KEY' in HTTP Request nodes
   ‚Ä¢ Or use HTTP Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE credentials

3. **Blotato API**
   ‚Ä¢ Get from: https://blotato.com/
   ‚Ä¢ Used for: TikTok & Instagram posting
   ‚Ä¢ Add to: Blotato nodes

4. **Telegram Bot Token**
   ‚Ä¢ Create via @BotFather
   ‚Ä¢ Used for: Preview delivery
   ‚Ä¢ Add to: Telegram nodes

**‚ö° Quick Setup:**
1. Replace all API key placeholders
2. Configure reference images (5 images for character)
3. Set Telegram chat ID for delivery
4. Configure Blotato accounts (TikTok & Instagram)
5. Test with schedule trigger

**üì∏ Reference Images:**
Update the 5 image URLs in 'Create Start Frame' node with your character reference images.

## üìñ Story Creation Section

**What it does:**
‚Ä¢ Randomly selects location (1-100) and 3 unique poses (1-15)
‚Ä¢ GPT-4o generates cinematic prompts for first/last frames
‚Ä¢ Creates consistent character identity across frames
‚Ä¢ Generates video motion prompts with dynamic camera movements

**Key Features:**
‚Ä¢ 100 unique locations (beaches, cities, cafes, etc.)
‚Ä¢ 15 different poses (facing camera, side profile, walking, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Maintains character consistency (same face, hair, features)
‚Ä¢ Cinematic style with photorealistic quality
‚Ä¢ Dynamic camera movements (arc shots, dolly, crane, etc.)

## üñºÔ∏è Start Frame Image Generation

**What it does:**
‚Ä¢ Uses Google Nano Banana Edit model via KIE.AI
‚Ä¢ Generates first frame with character in initial pose
‚Ä¢ Applies outfit and location from story creation
‚Ä¢ Waits for AI processing completion (polling)

**Process:**
1. Create task with prompt + reference images
2. Wait 5 seconds
3. Poll status until 'success'
4. Extract image URL from result

**Output:** 9:16 aspect ratio JPEG image

## üé¨ Veo 3.1 Video Generation

**What it does:**
‚Ä¢ Uses Google Veo 3.1 Fast model via KIE.AI
‚Ä¢ Creates smooth video transition between frames
‚Ä¢ Generates cinematic motion with natural character movement
‚Ä¢ Maintains character consistency throughout video

**Input:**
‚Ä¢ Start frame image URL
‚Ä¢ End frame image URL
‚Ä¢ Video motion prompt (from story creation)

**Process:**
1. Submit video generation task
2. Wait for processing (webhook-based)
3. Poll until completion
4. Extract video URL

**Output:** 9:16 aspect ratio video with watermark

## üì± Social Media Publishing

**What it does:**
‚Ä¢ Generates title, description, and hashtags using GPT-4o
‚Ä¢ Posts to TikTok with AI-generated content label
‚Ä¢ Posts to Instagram with same content
‚Ä¢ Sends previews via Telegram

**Content Generation:**
‚Ä¢ Catchy title (max 8 words)
‚Ä¢ Engaging description (1-2 sentences)
‚Ä¢ 5 relevant hashtags (aesthetic, fashion, cinematic)

**Platforms:**
‚Ä¢ TikTok (with AI disclosure)
‚Ä¢ Instagram
‚Ä¢ Telegram (preview delivery)

## üñºÔ∏è End Frame Image Generation

**What it does:**
‚Ä¢ Uses Google Nano Banana Edit to create final frame
‚Ä¢ Uses start frame as reference for consistency
‚Ä¢ Changes only pose/expression (same character, location, outfit)
‚Ä¢ Maintains identical lighting and mood

**Process:**
1. Create task with last_frame prompt
2. Use start frame as reference image
3. Poll status until completion
4. Extract final image URL

**Output:** Matching 9:16 JPEG with pose change
